author: A. Conan Doyle
content: WE had all been warned to appear before the magistrates upon the Thursday; but when the Thursday came there was no occasion for our testimony.

next.content: "Gregson and Lestrade will be wild about his death," Holmes remarked, as we chatted it over next evening.
